> Quickstride steps onto the plate and slams a hoof down on the ground.
> =

> " THAT'S ENOUGH!  IT'S ONE THING TA PICK A FIGHT WITH THE BIG GUYS BUT W=
HEN YA PICK ON SOMEONE WHO'S MUCH SMALLER THAN YOU, THAT'S WHERE I DRAW THE=
 LINE!  NOW DO AS HYDRAS SAYS AND KEEP YOURSELF IN LINE!  GEESH!  TALK ABOU=
T A PERPETUAL PEST!"
> 
> He then looks to Leo Prime.
> 
> " Sorry for the =
outburst, Sir but Dinobot's conduct is pushing my buttons the wrong way.   =
I heard the whole thing and he's the one who started on Rattrap.  Straight =
Shot spoke up because she's sticking up for him, and personally, I don't bl=
ame her.  She would not have acted defensively if she had not been harassed=
.  " 
> 

There was a snorted laugh from DINOBOT, "Oh, pick on her?  When I=
 had a trio of Maximals threatening to assault me for merely making optic c=
ontact with her?"  Remaining easily on his feet from the shake and quake, b=
ut his weapon remained away.  "Does this awareness extend to others of your=
 own organization, or do you all think in one mind, and each given to one i=
mmediately spreads out to the others?"

The Predacon at total ease.  "And s=
o you stick up for the one who threatened to attack me after I saw the one =
who had me killed in the first place.  Is that how you Maximals are?  My fa=
ction right or wrong?  No wonder you have left Cybertron in such a wretched=
 state, for your own blindness to everything, and regardless of circumstanc=
es your total blame of every event upon another and a denial fo your own re=
sponsibility."

DINOBOT's sneer continuing, but still no making threatening=
 moves.  "Does the Rodent still enjoy shooting his friends in the back and =
taking his gun so he can take their personal belongings?"
